channel.title: DeskFit Updates
channel.description: Updates for DeskFit - Your desk exercise companion

item.title: DeskFit 0.4.2
item.description:
DeskFit 0.4.2 - Universal Binary Support

Universal Binary: Now supports both Intel and Apple Silicon Macs with a single app!

  • ✅ Universal binary - works on both Intel (x86_64) and Apple Silicon (arm64) Macs
  • ✅ Native performance on both processor types
  • ✅ Single app bundle for all Mac users
  • ✅ Enhanced stability and performance optimizations
  • ✅ Bug fixes and improvements

Note: This universal binary is ~2x larger due to including both architectures.

item.title: DeskFit 0.4.0
item.description:
DeskFit 0.4.0 - Enhanced Performance

Working Release: This version includes all DeskFit features and runs without security warnings.

  • Enhanced performance and stability
  • UI/UX improvements and optimizations
  • Complete signing with Apple Developer ID
  • Bug fixes and code refinements
